name: The Last Assignment
description:
It's the last day of school. You had a ton of homework to do, but you finished all of it.

Almost.

There's one assignment left to do, and it would require several weeks of preparation. There's no way to make it... or is there?

A long time ago, a boy was assigned the exact same project, and he and his family disappeared several years ago. Their house is the scariest part of the village, but it's the only way you can pass the school year.

You must do it.

The Last Assignment is a point 'n' click game inspired by Scriptwelder's Deep Sleep series and the absurdity of childhood and horror stories. Try to find all of the gems and hidden references!

Mac, Linux and possibly Web versions coming soon.

Credits:

Made by 89o for the 2020 LOWREZJAM

Unlocking sound by cemagar on FreeSound

Grass walk sound by jankoehl on FreeSound
